title: U.S. advanced flat glass prices in 1999 and 2019 by glass type
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Flat glass Prices on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 1999 had the highest Flat glass Prices for Glass Type Smart glass and 2019 had the lowest Flat glass Prices for Glass Type Safety glass.
The maximum Flat glass Prices for 2019 that was found in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass was 20.37 times larger than the minimum Flat glass Prices observed in Glass Type Safety glass.
Averaging all 2 groups 1999, and 2019, the Glass Type Smart glass is the maximum Flat glass Prices and Safety glass is the minimum Flat glass Prices.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Flat glass Prices.
For Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the highest Flat glass Prices 3805.0 among the 2 groups and in Safety glass, 2019 had the lowest Flat glass Prices 68.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Flat glass Prices on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 1999 had the highest Flat glass Prices for Glass Type Smart glass and 2019 had the lowest Flat glass Prices for Glass Type Safety glass.
The maximum Flat glass Prices for 2019 that was found in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass was 20.37 times larger than the minimum Flat glass Prices observed in Glass Type Safety glass.
Averaging all 2 groups 1999, and 2019, the Glass Type Smart glass is the maximum Flat glass Prices and Safety glass is the minimum Flat glass Prices.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Flat glass Prices.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum Flat glass Prices among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum Flat glass Prices was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
Among all the Glass Types, 2019 had the highest Flat glass Prices 1385.0 in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass and lowest value 68.0 in Glass Type Safety glass.
There is a gap of 1317.0 between the highest and lowest Flat glass Prices found for 2019 in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass and Safety glass.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Flat glass Prices was found in case of 1999.
On average, the Glass Type Smart glass had the highest Flat glass Prices for all 2 groups 1999, and 2019. Whereas Safety glass had the lowest average Flat glass Prices.
